body:
I hack on Hypixel. Some of you probably know that, but now everyone knows that.
And please god, don't let one of you be staff on Hypixel.

replies.body: No need to worry Voltdrive if you don't like that server then why not?
replies.body_tagged: No need to worry Voltdrive if you don't like that server then why not?

replies.body:
Hacking just shows disrespect to the server no matter how much you hate the server.
If i was a server owner i would ban people from my server who intentionally hacked on a server just to show disrespect for no good valid reason. It just makes the hacker look like an asshole.
And by you i mean everyone.
For example: let's say i own Avicus. Someone from Avicus goes to OCN just to show disrespect by hacking. I would ban him from Avicus for that.
